name: v0.1.20
body:
To use this release, paste the following into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_musl", version = "0.1.20", dev_dependency = True)
```

If you need to attach custom exec or target constraints to these toolchains, you can write:
```starlark
toolchains_musl = use_extension("@toolchains_musl//:toolchains_musl.bzl", "toolchains_musl", dev_dependency = True)
toolchains_musl.config(
    extra_exec_compatible_with = ["//some/constraint:label"],
    extra_target_compatible_with = ["@some//other/constraint:label"],
)
```

If you are using `WORKSPACE`, paste the following instead:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "musl_toolchains",
    sha256 = "86bf928e6b11e81d2d33ca8e044b875f1ed7c7016b607376dd5575db7342c31e",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/releases/download/v0.1.20/musl_toolchain-v0.1.20.tar.gz",
)

load("@musl_toolchains//:repositories.bzl", "load_musl_toolchains")

load_musl_toolchains()

load("@musl_toolchains//:toolchains.bzl", "register_musl_toolchains")

register_musl_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Build against glibc 2.26 by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/41


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.19...v0.1.20

## What's Changed
* Run `cc_test`s with a hermetic musl dynamic linker by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/39


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.18...v0.1.19

name: v0.1.18
body:
To use this release, paste the following into your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_musl", version = "0.1.18", dev_dependency = True)

If you need to attach custom exec or target constraints to these toolchains, you can write:

    name = "musl_toolchains",
    sha256 = "19d3d3a57748f27f24063eee862e8e1be57523974e29bae7a39fbfd245f43710",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/releases/download/v0.1.18/musl_toolchain-v0.1.18.tar.gz",

load("@musl_toolchains//:repositories.bzl", "load_musl_toolchains")

load("@musl_toolchains//:toolchains.bzl", "register_musl_toolchains")

register_musl_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Update musl-cross-make for reproducibility by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/34
* Build macOS from a case-sensitive volume by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/35
* Add Linux aarch64 builds by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/38
* Fix tester arch for Linux aarch64 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/40


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.17...v0.1.18

## What's Changed
* Bump macos runners - 11 are no longer available by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/33
* Use correct target arch in directory name for glob by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/32


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.16...v0.1.17

## What's Changed
* Rename cc_toolchain from musl_toolchain by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/29


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.15...v0.1.16

## What's Changed
* Strip Linux binaries by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/27
* Ensure compatibility with Bazel 6 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/28


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.14...v0.1.15

## What's Changed
* Add missing toolchain features by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/21
* Enable `fully_static_link` by default by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/22
* Declare linker support for param files by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/24
* Disable isl by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/23


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.12...v0.1.13

## New Contributors
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/18

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.9...v0.1.10

## What's Changed
* Fix up repositories.bzl generation by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/10


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.3...v0.1.4

name: v0.1.3
body:
To use this release, past the following into your WORKSPACE file:

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "musl_toolchains",
    sha256 = "048ac0bef501e720080eff16b510541d6c364d503196cc53c6817748e03c5d01",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/releases/download/v0.1.3/musl_toolchain-v0.1.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@musl_toolchains//:repositories.bzl", "load_musl_toolchains")

load_musl_toolchains()

load("@musl_toolchains//:toolchains.bzl", "register_musl_toolchains")

register_musl_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Allow specifying extra {exec,target}_compatible_with conditions by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/8
* Still create BUILD.bazel file by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/9


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.1...v0.1.3

* Inject version numbers properly by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/7


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
To use this release, past the following into your WORKSPACE file:

```
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "musl_toolchains",
    sha256 = "b9769b8e1272a8382001fd85ac8719693fc1fc91c787b8ee2bcace700e403088",

)

load_musl_toolchains()

load("@musl_toolchains//:toolchains.bzl", "register_musl_toolchains")

register_musl_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Add musl toolchain building and testing pipeline by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/1
* Misc fixes by @illicitonion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/4

## New Contributors
* @illicitonion made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/musl-toolchain/commits/v0.1.0
